name: The Cleansing
description:
Sometimes in order to repair something one must first destroy the root cause of the problem. Humanity has run out of time. They have refused to change. They must be removed for the planet to heal.

How To Play
* Click anywhere on screen to fire a meteor at the buildings
* Meteors follow a projectile path - you must account for gravity
* Click the "<" and ">" buttons to switch between large and small meteors
* Meteors cost points to fire.
* You gain points by destroying buildings.
* Go Forth and Destroy!!!
